question_one: How can I sell products on Handvibe?
answer_one:
1.) Log in to your account. 
2.) Go to the 'Add Product' section. 
3.) Fill in the required details about your product. 
4.) After the approval process, your product will be published.
question_two: When will my product be approved?
answer_two: Products are reviewed for community guidelines compliance. The review process is typically completed within 24 hours.
question_three: Can I return the product I bought?
answer_three: Handvibe is a marketplace between sellers and buyers. The return policy depends on the seller. You can contact the seller for detailed information.
question_four: I cannot change the name, surname, email, etc. I entered. Can I change this information?
answer_four: As this information is sensitive, for any modifications, please contact us at contact@ayotechcorp.com.
question_five: How do I delete my Handvibe account?
answer_five:
1.) Log in to your account. 
2.) Navigate to your profile settings. 
3.) Look for the account deletion option. 
4.) Follow the instructions provided to permanently delete your account.
content_warning_message: This content may have been deleted or is inaccessible.
user_not_found_content: User information cannot be accessed, the user may have suspended or deleted their account
permission_request_error: Certain features require necessary permissions to function properly. Please grant the required permissions to ensure a seamless app experience.
on_boarding_one_title: Sell Your Handmade Creations for Free!
on_boarding_one_content: Turn your passion into profit! On Handvibe, you can list and sell your handmade products without any fees. No hidden costs, no commissions—just connect with buyers and grow your small business.
on_boarding_two_content: Chat directly with buyers within the app to discuss details and finalize sales.
on_boarding_three_content: Whether you create jewelry, clothing, or home decor, Handvibe is the perfect place to showcase your talent. Start selling today without worrying about platform fees—your creativity deserves a free stage!
exit_message: Are you sure you want to sign out?
